sense.def: Alternative Names ju zhi 舉痔 , raised piles; shu nai zhi 鼠奶痔 , mouse-nipple piles; shu ru zhi 鼠乳痔 , mouse-breast piles. Pathological Condition of zhi chuang 痔瘡 , piles sores, which develop inside the anus with many tumorous flesh-growths resembling breast nipples. Pu ji fang 普濟方 297 ：穀道四面肉如 奶，名鼠痔 , “Flesh-growths on all four sides of the path of grain resembling breast nipples are called ‘ mouse piles ’”.
